Title: Expands the entities that may make recommendations for administering immunizations to include the immunization advisory council and the 21st century workgroup for disease elimination and reduction
Summary: Expands the entities that may make recommendations for administering immunizations to include the immunization advisory council and the 21st century workgroup for disease elimination and reduction.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to entities authorized to make recommendations on the administration of immunizations
